alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Mitchell, southwestern Jewell, southeastern Smith and northeastern Osborne Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 721 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Portis to near Cawker City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Downs, Cawker City, Glen Elder, Jewell, Lebanon, Portis, Esbon and Ionia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Kansas.
